snippet:
proof fn lemma_total_ordering<T: TotalOrder>()
        ensures total_ordering(spec_leq::<T>())

fn sort_vec<T: TotalOrder + Copy + Send + 'static>(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<T>) -> (sorted: Vec<T>)
        requires a.spec_len() <= usize::MAX,
        ensures sorted@ =~= a.seq@.sort_by(spec_leq::<T>())
        decreases a.spec_len(), 1usize,

fn median_of_three<T: TotalOrder + Copy>(a: T, b: T, c: T) -> (median: T)
        ensures
            median == a || median == b || median == c,
            median == spec_median_of_three(a, b, c),

fn median3_pivot_idx<T: TotalOrder + Copy>(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<T>, n: usize) -> (idx: usize)
        requires n >= 2, n == a.spec_len(),
        ensures
            idx < n,
            idx == 0 || idx == n / 2 || idx == n - 1,
            a.seq@[idx as int] == spec_median_of_three(a.seq@[0], a.seq@[(n / 2) as int], a.seq@[(n - 1) as int]),

fn sort_vec_with_idx<T: TotalOrder + Copy + Send + 'static>(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<T>, pivot_idx: usize) -> (sorted: Vec<T>)
        requires
            a.spec_len() <= usize::MAX,
            a.spec_len() >= 2,
            pivot_idx < a.spec_len(),
        ensures sorted@ =~= a.seq@.sort_by(spec_leq::<T>())
        decreases a.spec_len(), 0usize,

fn pivot_mt_first(&self, lo: usize, hi: usize) -> T
            requires lo < hi, hi <= self.spec_len();

fn pivot_mt_median3(&self, lo: usize, hi: usize) -> T
            requires lo < hi, hi <= self.spec_len();

fn pivot_mt_random(&self, lo: usize, hi: usize) -> T
            requires lo < hi, hi <= self.spec_len();
fn quick_sort_mt_first(&self);
fn quick_sort_mt_median3(&self);
fn quick_sort_mt_random(&self);
